item.title: Colombia yields on US deportation flights to avert trade war
item.description: President Gustavo Petro agrees to accept deported migrants after Trump ordered 25% tariffs on all goods.

item.title: New Zealand eases visa rules to lure 'digital nomads'
item.description: Under the new rules, visitors to the country can work remotely while holidaying for up to 90 days.

item.title: DeepSeek shocks AI world with 'cheap' Chinese chatbot
item.description: It has overtaken ChatGPT to become the top free application on Apple's App Store in the UK.

item.title: Nigerian star 2Baba announces separation from wife
item.description: Tuface, also known as 2Baba, is seen as one of the pioneers of Nigeria's vibrant music scene.

item.title: Sweden seizes ship after suspected Baltic Sea cable sabotage
item.description: Prosecutors have launched an investigation after an undersea cable leading to Latvia was damaged.
